p: Patients were recruited to the AFIRE study from eight tertiary hospitals in seven cities in Indonesia: Bandung, Denpasar, Jakarta, Makassar, Semarang, Surabaya and Yogyakarta ( Fig 1). All study sites contributed cases by diagnosing DENV clinically and/or using laboratory diagnostics (NS1 and/or serology test and/or rapid diagnostic test using different manufacturer).
